showPopup

public static void showPopup(oracle.adf.view.rich.component.rich.RichPopup popup)
Show the popup.

Parameters:
popup - UI Component to popup

isSearchEnabled

public static boolean isSearchEnabled()
Is search enabled. Enablement is decieded firstly by system property FUSION_APPS_SEARCH_ENGINE_AVAILABLE. This allows global switch off for all users, it is designed primarily for ATGLITE environments where SES is not deployed. If this test passes, the profile FUSION_APPS_SEARCH_ENABLED is checked. This allows fusion search to be turned off at any of the levels profiles define. The primary case here is to turn off search until it is configured, perhaps having it on only for the admins doing config.

Returns:
true is search enabled, false otherwise.

isSearchEnabledViaSysprop

public static boolean isSearchEnabledViaSysprop()
Is search enabled via the java runtime switch FUSION_APPS_SEARCH_ENGINE_AVAILABLE. This is expected to be set to Y/N, an absent or incorrect value implies a true result.

Returns:
true is search enabled via switch, false otherwise.

isSearchEnabledViaProfile

public static boolean isSearchEnabledViaProfile()
Is search enabled via the profile FUSION_APPS_SEARCH_ENABLED. This is expected to be set to Y/N, an absent or incorrect value implies a false result (which should never happen).

Returns:
true is search enabled via profile, false otherwise.

isRTL

public static boolean isRTL()
Are we in a right to Left reading envirnoment.

Returns:
true if rtl, false otherwise;

                                                                java.util.List<SearchCategory> allCats)
Turn searchCategories into a unique list of SearchCategories.

Parameters:
searchCategories - may be null, empty String, a csv list of category names, a list of SearchCategory classes
allCats - a List of all allowed SearchCategories.
Returns:
a new List of SearchCategories, each category will be a reference to those in allCats.

showGlobalSearchResultsPopup

public static void showGlobalSearchResultsPopup(SearchResult sr,
                                                javax.faces.component.UIComponent c)
Process the Search sr, if there are errors, show the error popup, else save the search result to the session and show the global search results popup.

Parameters:
sr - search result to show.
c - the UI Component to the results will be displayed within.

refreshCurrentResultsUI

public static void refreshCurrentResultsUI(SearchResult sr,
                                           javax.faces.component.UIComponent c)
Refresh the currently shown search results UI after a search. This method also saves the search result to the session. If the results has errors, these will be shown int eh ewrror popup.

Parameters:
sr - search result to show.
c - some UI Component within the existing results.

getLOVSelectedRowKeys

public static org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.model.RowKeySet getLOVSelectedRowKeys()
Get the single pageflow scope rowKeySet used in our LOVs. This is to work around the InMemoryChangeManager issues with re-used tables that need different selected rows.

Returns:
RowKeySet for binding to table via selectedRowKeys attribute.

                                               java.lang.String subStr)

isTagCloudEnabled

public static boolean isTagCloudEnabled()
Is search tag cloud and tagging of results enabled via the java runtime switch FUSION_APPS_SEARCH_TAGCLOUD_AVAILABLE. This is expected to be set to Y/N, an absent or incorrect value implies a false result - i.e. opt in.

Returns:
true is search tag cloud and tagging of results enabled via switch, false otherwise.

JSONquote

public static java.lang.String JSONquote(java.lang.String string)
Produce a string in double quotes with backslash sequences in all the right places. A backslash will be inserted within </, allowing JSON text to be delivered in HTML. In JSON text, a string cannot contain a control character or an unescaped quote or backslash.

Parameters:
string - A String
Returns:
A String correctly formatted for insertion in a JSON text.

                                                  int maxItems)

Parameters:
items - list of items, may be empty but never null.
maxItems - maximum number of items to add.
Returns:
a StringBuilder of at most maxItems items.

getURLInternal

public static java.lang.String getURLInternal(java.lang.String webApp,
                                              java.lang.String viewId,
                                              java.lang.String pageParametersList,
                                              java.lang.String navTaskFlowId,
                                              java.lang.String navTaskKeyList,
                                              java.lang.String navTaskParametersList,
                                              java.lang.String navTaskLabel,
                                              FndMethodParameters methodParameters)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
Construct a URL for the given navigation target taskflow within a UIShell page. This url will include parameters to that taskflow,. The result should be complete enough to be handed off to an external consumer such as the browser bookmark, OSN etc such that at some later time it can be called and will navigate successfully.

This is similar to navigateInternal in the simple case for cross webApp navigation.

This is an internal api used by UIShell team. External teams should not call this api.

Parameters:
webApp - web application to be looked up in taxonomy.
viewId - view (or page) id.
pageParametersList - parameters for the page. This is a semicolon separated list of name=value pairs.
navTaskFlowId - task flow id of the form /WEB-INF/path/to/MyTaskFlow.xml#MyActivity
navTaskKeyList - key list of parameters to distinguish tabs in a running UIShell page. This is a semicolon separated list of name=value pairs.
navTaskParametersList - parameters to the task flow. This is a semicolon separated list of name=value pairs.
navTaskLabel - label to be shown on the task flow.
Returns:
A String representing the URL.
Throws:
IOException, - IllegalArgumentException
java.io.IOException

s - potential expression.

evalueated s, else s.
